FuncDef:
The policy command creates an IOAM policy view and displays the view, or displays an existing IOAM policy view.
The undo policy command deletes a created IOAM policy. The policy command creates an IOAM policy view and displays the view, or displays an existing IOAM policy view. The undo policy command deletes a created IOAM policy. By default, no IOAM policy is created in the system. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specify the value of the IOAM policy ID.
The value is 1.
